3: Liv, can you analyze the material constituents inside the energy chamber?
I can't identify its properties, but I've been recording all the observational data. I'll hand it over to HQ after this.
The energy chamber is changing in color!
It turned from red to purple.
We can do nothing but wait now.
Your companions are awaiting your return.
But they do not know, what you have been going through.
...Enough with the hogwash, at least my plan's complete.
You're still so naive. Indeed, you have fended against the viral corruption with the power of Tenebrion, but can you really take all the credit?
I admit, I needed your help there...
We were always one, but your existence has proven the fragility of this body.
But I, I am different. What I long for is absolute power.
And for this, I am stronger than you.
